category1.title: Fleeting Filmmaker
category1.description: If you scored 0 to 4 points, you seem more lost than the protagonist of a horror movie in a haunted house. But don't worry, we all start somewhere. Keep watching more movies, and soon you'll be a respectable cinephile!

category2.title: Background Extra
category2.description: If you got 5 to 9 points, you're like the extra who briefly appears in a scene and goes unnoticed. Although you're not a movie star, you have the potential to shine if you continue immersing yourself in the cinematic world.

category3.title: Armchair Critic
category3.description: If you scored 10 to 14 points, you're like a film critic in the armchair at the back. You have some solid opinions about movies, but you haven't earned a VIP pass on the red carpet yet.

category4.title: Spoiler Master
category4.description: If you achieved 15 to 19 points, you're a spoiler master, capable of predicting plot twists before they happen. Your knowledge of movies is so extensive that you could direct a three-hour film without the need for editing.

category5.title: Editing Genius
category5.description: If you got 20 points, you're an editing genius of the silver screen! You're like the Quentin Tarantino of the quiz, able to blend movie genres and references into a unique masterpiece. Your knowledge of movies is so impressive that the closing credits aren't enough to acknowledge it
